snippet: Iraq’s largest offensive against Islamic State militants came a step closer to the city of Tikrit on Friday, according to Iraqi state television.
abstract: Iraqi troops and Shiite militias advance on town of Tikrit, which is still held by Islamic State militants.

byline.contributor: Omar al-Jawoshy and Ahmed Saleh contributed reporting from Baghdad, and an employee of The New York Times from Salahuddin Province.

lead_paragraph: Iraq’s largest offensive against Islamic State militants came a step closer to the city of Tikrit on Friday, according to Iraqi state television.

headline.main: Iraqi Forces Said to Near ISIS-Held Tikrit
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Forces Said to Near ISIS-Held Tikrit

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
